title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in South Africa in each Company on the y axis.
The highest category is found at The Coca-Cola Co where Market share in South Africa is 49.8.
The lowest category is found at PepsiCo Inc where Market share in South Africa is 5.5.
The highest value at The Coca-Cola Co is almost 9.05 times larger than the minimum value of PepsiCo Inc.
The highest value at The Coca-Cola Co is almost 9.05 times larger than the minimum value of PepsiCo Inc.
The difference between the max Company The Coca-Cola Co and min Company PepsiCo Inc is 44.3.
